r.d: Support for YAML 1.1 (YAML Ain't Markup Language) serialization using the LibYAML library.
r.n: New Features: - Basic PHP8 (master branch) compatiblity Bugs Fixed: - #79494: The 64-bit YAML ext uses 32-bit signed integer arithmetics (cmb69) - Use ZEND_LONG_FMT to fix -Wformat warnings (carusogabriel) - Fix memory leaks when writing timestamps (cmb69) - Update tests/yaml_parse_file_002.phpt for PHP8 (carusogabriel) - #78353: Remove deprecated TSRM macros (a.dankovtsev)
